thread.title: Customer loyalty comes at a price
thread.title_full: Customer loyalty comes at a price

title: Customer loyalty comes at a price
text:
Customer loyalty comes at a price Customer loyalty comes at a price 32 min ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
Australian companies may soon be offering shares in themselves rather than coupons, tokens and frequent flyer points to strengthen their connection with customers. Several Australian companies, including Domino's Pizza Enterprises, have been looking at issuing their own shares to customers through share-buying app Loyal3 to generate stronger customer loyalty.   Sydney Morning Herald.
